dmca.title: Copyright Infringement Notification - borda.ca WSB-R377
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Richard Kawasaki [mailto:richardk@baytsp.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 08, 2007 5:02 PM
To: packer@gmail.com; Copyright
Cc: Webmistress Lisa
Subject: Copyright Infringement Notification - borda.ca WSB-R377

 

Dear Sirs: 

 

The poster responsible for the thread detailed below, Balu, has posted
dozens of our client's copyrighted content on your website. This
egregious example of copyright infringement cannot be tolerated. We
therefore strongly urge you to delete this entire thread and immediately
ban this individual from posting to your website again.

 

WSB/www.lindaoneil.com has authorized BayTSP.com to act as its agent for
copyright infringement  notification. The spidering of the Web has
detected infringements on your website as detailed in the  attached
report.  Therefore, this letter is an official notification under the
provisions of section  512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to
effect removal of the detected infringements listed in  the attached
report. The Berne Convention for the Protection of Literary and Artistic
Works, the  Universal Copyright Convention, as well as bilateral
treaties with other countries allow for protection  of our client's
images even beyond US borders. The attached documentation specifies the
exact location  of the infringement. The BayFileID identifies the images
by shoot number.  We hereby request that you immediately remove the
offending material, as specified in RFC 1036, and refrain from using our
client's materials in the future.

 

BayTSP.com has a good faith belief that use of the material in the
manner complained of in the attached report, is not authorized by
WSB/www.lindaoneil.com, its agent, or the law. The information provided
herein is accurate to the best of our knowledge.  

 

BayTSP.com hereby swears under penalty of perjury that BayTSP.com is
authorized to act on behalf of  WSB/www.lindaoneil.com. for matters
pertaining to notification of infringement of its exclusive rights in
its copyrighted material.

 

Please send us a prompt response indicating the actions you have taken
to resolve this matter. Please reference BayTSP Notification ID in your
response.

 

 

 

Sincerely, 

 

 

Richard Kawasaki

Compliance Manager

BayTSP.com

PO Box 1314

Los Gatos, CA 95031-1314

(408) 341-2300

dmca@baytsp.com

 

Infringing thread:

http://www.borda.ca/showthread.php?t=119533
